name: Select MC
Select Status
func:
msg.payload = "select [Status] from [MMS].[dbo].[MasterStatusCode] where [StatusCode] = '"+msg.statuscode+"'";

return msg

name: select Status
func:
msg.topic = msg.payload;

msg.payload =  `
SELECT TOP (1) [Status]
  FROM [MMS].[dbo].[MCLog]
  where NodeMCU = '`+msg.payload+`'
  order by TimeStamp desc`
  

return msg;

name: Get status
func:
msg.Status = msg.payload[0].Status
return msg;

name: Select MC
SetMC

msg.MC = msg.payload[0].MC




return msg;

name: Insert database
STOP
START
ALARM
MC01
func:
msg.topic = '0'
return msg;

name: Stacked graph
Get data
func:
var dateSelection = global.get('DatePickerbyDay')

var dateSelectionPlus = global.get('DatePickerbydayPlus')

msg.payload = `WITH TMP AS (SELECT TimeStamp,MC,Status
      ,ISNULL(LAG(TimeStamp) OVER ( PARTITION BY MC ORDER BY TimeStamp desc),'`+dateSelectionPlus+` 07:00:00.000') AS LAST_START_DATE
	  FROM [MMS].[dbo].[MCLog]
	  where MfgDate = '`+dateSelection+`')  ,
	sum1 as (  SELECT TMP.MC,TMP.Status as Status,
       sum(DATEDIFF(second,TMP.TimeStamp,TMP.LAST_START_DATE)) DATE_DIFF
  FROM TMP
  group by MC,Status),
    
setzero as (
  select
  [MC]
  ,isnull([START],0) as [START]
  ,isnull([STOP],0) as [STOP]  
  ,isnull([ALARM],0) as [ALARM]  
   
FROM sum1 
PIVOT (sum([DATE_DIFF]) FOR [STATUS] IN ([START],[STOP],[ALARM])) AS P)
select [MC]
,ROUND(CAST(START AS float) / CAST(3600 AS float),2) as START
,ROUND(CAST(STOP AS float) / CAST(3600 AS float),2) as STOP
,ROUND(CAST(ALARM AS float) / CAST(3600 AS float),2) as ALARM
from setzero
order by stop desc`



return msg;

name: LastUpdate
Get data
func:
msg.payload = `WITH TMP AS (SELECT TimeStamp,MC,Status
      ,ISNULL(LAG(TimeStamp) OVER ( PARTITION BY MC ORDER BY TimeStamp desc),getdate()) AS LAST_START_DATE
	  FROM [MMS].[dbo].[MCLog]
	  where MfgDate = Cast(getdate() as date))  ,
	sum1 as (  SELECT TMP.MC,TMP.Status as Status,
       sum(DATEDIFF(second,TMP.TimeStamp,TMP.LAST_START_DATE)) DATE_DIFF
  FROM TMP
  group by MC,Status),
    
setzero as (
  select
  [MC]
  ,isnull([START],0) as [START]
  ,isnull([STOP],0) as [STOP]  
  ,isnull([ALARM],0) as [ALARM]  
   
FROM sum1 
PIVOT (sum([DATE_DIFF]) FOR [STATUS] IN ([START],[STOP],[ALARM])) AS P)

select * from setzero`



return msg;

name: Stacked graph
Stacked graph
Get data
func:
var dateSelection = global.get('DatePickerbyDay')
var dateSelection2 = global.get('DatePickerbyDay2')
var dateSelectionPlus = global.get('DatePickerbydayPlus')


msg.payload = `WITH TMP AS (SELECT TimeStamp,MC,Status
      ,ISNULL(LAG(TimeStamp) OVER ( PARTITION BY MC ORDER BY TimeStamp desc),'`+dateSelectionPlus+` 07:00:00.000') AS LAST_START_DATE
	  FROM [MMS].[dbo].[MCLog]
	 where MfgDate between '`+dateSelection+`' and '`+dateSelection2+`' )    ,
	sum1 as (  SELECT TMP.MC,TMP.Status as Status,
       sum(DATEDIFF(second,TMP.TimeStamp,TMP.LAST_START_DATE)) DATE_DIFF
  FROM TMP
  group by MC,Status),
    
setzero as (
  select
  [MC]
  ,isnull([START],0) as [START]
  ,isnull([STOP],0) as [STOP]  
  ,isnull([ALARM],0) as [ALARM]  
   
FROM sum1 
PIVOT (sum([DATE_DIFF]) FOR [STATUS] IN ([START],[STOP],[ALARM])) AS P)
select [MC]
,ROUND(CAST(START AS float) / CAST(3600 AS float),2) as START
,ROUND(CAST(STOP AS float) / CAST(3600 AS float),2) as STOP
,ROUND(CAST(ALARM AS float) / CAST(3600 AS float),2) as ALARM
from setzero
order by stop desc`



return msg;
